name: adb-pro
title: ADB Pro
description: The ultimate Android Debug Bridge (ADB) tool for Raycast. Manage devices, install APKs, view Logcat, and control permissions directly from your Raycast.
author: adventures92

commands.name: check-adb
commands.title: Check ADB Status
commands.subtitle: System Health
commands.description: Verify if ADB is installed and properly configured in your system path.

commands.name: manage-devices
commands.title: Manage Devices
commands.subtitle: ADB Dashboard
commands.description: The central hub to view all connected devices and their statuses.

commands.name: restart-adb
commands.title: Restart ADB Server
commands.subtitle: Troubleshooting
commands.description: Kill and restart the ADB server if devices are not reflecting correctly.

commands.name: launch-app
commands.title: Launch App
commands.subtitle: Start Activity
commands.description: Instantly start the main activity of the selected application.

commands.name: force-stop
commands.title: Force Stop App
commands.subtitle: Kill Process
commands.description: Immediately stop a running application on the selected device.

commands.name: clear-data
commands.title: Clear App Data
commands.subtitle: Reset App
commands.description: Wipe all data and cache for a specific application.

commands.name: uninstall-app
commands.title: Uninstall App
commands.subtitle: Remove
commands.description: Remove an application from the selected device.

commands.name: open-app-settings
commands.title: Open App Settings
commands.subtitle: System Settings
commands.description: Open the Android system settings page for the specific app.

commands.name: install-apk
commands.title: Install APK
commands.subtitle: Deployment
commands.description: Select an APK from your computer and install it onto a device.

commands.name: toggle-wifi
commands.title: Toggle WiFi
commands.subtitle: Network
commands.description: Enable or disable WiFi on the selected device.

commands.name: toggle-mobile-data
commands.title: Toggle Mobile Data
commands.subtitle: Network
commands.description: Enable or disable Mobile Data on the selected device.

commands.name: toggle-airplane-mode
commands.title: Toggle Airplane Mode
commands.subtitle: Network
commands.description: Switch Airplane Mode on or off.

commands.name: toggle-dark-mode
commands.title: Toggle Dark Mode
commands.subtitle: UI Theme
commands.description: Switch system theme between Light and Dark mode.

commands.name: toggle-layout-bounds
commands.title: Toggle Layout Bounds
commands.subtitle: Debugging
commands.description: Show or hide layout bounds for UI debugging.

commands.name: send-clipboard
commands.title: Send Clipboard Text
commands.subtitle: Input
commands.description: Type your Mac's clipboard content into the device.

commands.name: launch-emulator
commands.title: Launch Emulator
commands.subtitle: Virtual Device
commands.description: Start an Android Virtual Device (AVD).

commands.name: kill-emulator
commands.title: Kill Emulator
commands.subtitle: Virtual Device
commands.description: Stop a running emulator instance.

commands.name: manage-permissions
commands.title: Manage Permissions
commands.subtitle: Security
commands.description: Grant or revoke runtime permissions for an app.

commands.name: set-proxy
commands.title: Set HTTP Proxy
commands.subtitle: Network
commands.description: Configure global HTTP proxy for debugging.

commands.name: view-logcat
commands.title: View Logcat
commands.subtitle: Debugging
commands.description: View real-time logs from device.

commands.name: simulate-battery
commands.title: Simulate Battery
commands.subtitle: Power
commands.description: Mock battery level and charging state.

commands.name: benchmark-start
commands.title: Benchmark Cold Start
commands.subtitle: Performance
commands.description: Measure app cold start time.

commands.name: set-resolution
commands.title: Change Resolution/DPI
commands.subtitle: UI Testing
commands.description: Override screen size and density.

commands.name: simulate-keys
commands.title: Simulate Hardware Keys
commands.subtitle: Navigation
commands.description: Press Home, Back, Power, etc.

commands.name: wireless-connect
commands.title: Wireless Debugging Wizard
commands.subtitle: Connectivity
commands.description: Switch to TCP/IP and connect wirelessly.

commands.name: mirror-screen
commands.title: Mirror Screen (Scrcpy)
commands.subtitle: Tools
commands.description: Launch scrcpy to mirror device screen.

commands.name: firebase-debug
commands.title: Firebase Debug Mode
commands.subtitle: Analytics
commands.description: Toggle Firebase Analytics debug mode.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
